titles.title: Single Standard of Aviation Safety Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to make nonmilitary government aircraft subject to safety regulation by the Department of Transportation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/14/1999--Introduced. Single Standard of Aviation Safety Act - Amends Federal aviation law to subject to Federal Aviation Administration safety regulation both nonmilitary government aircraft and military aircraft transporting civilians (including persons who operate such aircraft).
